item.title: Broken uneven slab causing a tripping hazard on a busy residential road with a number of elderly residents and families with young children, 13th June

item.title: Ask dieback, 13th June
item.description:
The tree outside 39A Park Avenue has been diagnosed with Ash Dieback and as such is dangerous. The limbs of the tree are long and leggy and pose an increased risk of breaking.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Avenue, Plaistow, London
